EmailTemplate.description: Earn 19 CPE's and credit all year long / Subs/conf reg bundle offer Feb 2016
EmailTemplate.name: CW16 Subs bundle
EmailTemplate.subject: Earn 19 CPE credits in May ...and all year long (details inside)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Reply to this email to begin one year of unrestricted access to Compliance Week.
When you purchase one year of Compliance Week, you will receive a discount code for the Compliance Week conference.*
Need help with a group registration? Contact Eliza for assistance.
*Limited time offer. Subscribe and register by Feb. 29, 2016, and receive a single conference registration and a one-year subscription to Compliance Week. Offer valid for first-time single-user subscriptions only. No retroactive discounts or refunds will be given. Conference registration valued at $1,300 ($695 savings). One-year, single-user subscription valued at $1,199 ($600 savings). If you are interested in a multi-user license, please send your inquiry to Donna O'Neill.
